                byte[] iv,

        Decrypt AES ciphertext
        Parameters:
        header - JOSE header
        key - Symmetric key as byte array
        iv - Initialization Vector as byte array
        cipherBytes - Ciphertext as byte array
        authTag - Authentication tag as byte array
        Returns:
